title: Mass Cure Wounds
content:
Mass Cure Wounds Level 5 Evocation Spell 3~24 Healing 3d8+WIS/CHA Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies. No effect on undead and constructs. 18m Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Mass Cure Wounds

Level 5 Evocation Spell

Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies.

No effect on undead and constructs.

Mass Cure Wounds is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Mass Cure Wounds is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to En
